Package dal.rootdal

Class RootDAO

java.lang.Object
dal.rootdal.RootDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRootDao
public class RootDAO extends Object implements IRootDao
The RootDAO class implements the IRootDao interface and provides methods for interacting with root-related data in the data access layer of the Encyclopedia of Arabic Poetry application.
